name: Praat Escuela de Vuelo, S.C.
about: Praat Escuela de Vuelo, S.C. is a renowned aviation school founded in 2004, authorized by the Agencia Federal de Aviaci√≥n Civil (AFAC). We offer comprehensive training from zero to commercial pilot licenses, utilizing high-end simulators and online platforms for theoretical classes. Our programs include introduction to glass cockpit training and instrument exams, ensuring students are well-prepared for their careers. With multiple locations in Mexico, we provide a structured and validated education, both on-site and remotely, to meet the needs of aspiring pilots. Our commitment to quality and safety makes us a leading institution in aviation training.
services:
["CONTROLLED FLIGHT INTO TERRAIN
AIRLINE TRANSPORT PILOT
